name: Try Again First Playable
description:
Try Again (AGP/Thesis) First Playable Milestone

READ ME: 

PLEASE...IF POSSIBLE PLAY WITH A CONTROLLER 🙂 

- Move = Joystick or WASD

- Jump, Wall Run & Vault = Button South or Space

- Slide = Button East or Left CTRL

- All tutorialization on screen UI

- If you encounter bugs, use Left Alt & 1, 2, 3 or 4 to move through checkpoints and skip time

- Thank you for playing!
